detailsOfAchievement: The Kanglei Shaktam Langba Kanglup is a non-profiteering Cultural Organization which work for preservation, promote and disseminate the art, tradition and culture heritage of Manipur and India. This organization was formed in thr year 1972 and registered in the year 1975.The organization has participated many festivas in both state and national level, got positions and awrds. The artistes of this organization are continuous working for the promotion of art and culture and participating in cultural festivals that were held all over the country and abroad. Mention ar made 1) 12th National Festival of New Choreographies, 2010, New Delhi, 2) OCTAVE 2006, New Delhi, 3) ARCEDS 2006,Kolkta,4) 7th National Festial of New Choregraphies 2005, New Delhi, 5) Uday Shankar Dance Festival 2003, Kolkata, 6) Konark Festival 2003, Orissa, 7) West Bengal Dance Festive, 2003, Kolkata, 8) Mood Indigo 2001,Mmbai, 9) Kargil Vijay Diwas 2000, New Delhi, 10) Dweep Mahotsav 1997-98, Andaman&Nicobar Island etc and in abroad 1) Expo 2008, Spain, 2) 57th Festival Internacional De Musica Y Danza De Granada, 2008, Spain, 3) 5th Bangkok Fringe Festival 2003, Bangkok, 4) Kalaa Utsav 2003, Singapore, 5) Asia Pecific Arats Forum 2003, Taiwan, 6) IV Festival Spondylus De Las Artes 2003, Ecuador, 7) VI Festival Internacional Artes Escenicas 2003, Ecuador, 8) 5th Intenational Symposium on The Sacred &The Profane 2003,India and 9) The 26th Vikram Ssrabhai International Arts Festival 2001, India etc. Besides this the organization organized workshops and seminars etc. and regular daily classes in the premises f the institution are conducted and some Gurus are also engage at some school ofManipur.The oganization envisage to keep the traditional and performing art forms of Manipur alive as well as to reach it to the general mass of this country in particucar and aboard i general.

title: SANCHAALI A CENTRE FOR PERFORMING ART
detailsOfAchievement: One of the most active institutes of performing arts in Manipur the institute has been appreciated in and outside Manipur not only for its own compositions of traditional Manipuri dances of Raas Leela like Maharas Vasantaraas Divaraas Nityaraas Kunjaraas Lai haraoba and tribal dances but also for its creative compositions on contemporary thems Under the tutelage of its founder member M. Thoiba Singh and Pradhan Guru Smt. Lata Thounaojam who is also the first among the Manipuri female choreographers having recieved formal training in Choreography the institute has also earned a distinction for its compositions like Nachom on National Integration. Hey manipur on communal harmony in the state Poirei Chanurasing Meekap thokle on womens emancipation movement with reference to Manipuri women Abhisar based on song of Rabindra Sangeet Abhiram Prasanga Dance Drama Eklavya Dance Drama including a number of compositions for school children in addition to its much acclaimed Chakpa Jagoi a composition of Chakpa dances and various compositions of tribal dances. Committed to imparting knowledge of traditional performing arts of Manipur to the younger generations the institute has visited many places of India and abroad within till date Organising of seminars and workshops on the traditional dance and music of Manipur is one area the centre has seriously proposed to take up from time to time

title: Sangeet Kala Sangam
detailsOfAchievement: The Sangeet Kala Sangam is a cultural institution set up by a group of artistes of different bachground of Dance,Music, Theatre and Martial Arts with a view to undertake various activities for promotion of art & culture with its objects 1. to propogate and spread the knowledge of Manipuri art and culture in its pristine purity specially in dance, drama and music among the people of Manipur and other states of India. 2. to preserve the secred treasur of Manipuri art and culture. 3. to do continous reserch work in all dpartment of Manipuri culture 4. to revive and preserve folk music/dance/folk drama 5. to forster cultural contracts between hills and palin of Manipur and also with other states of India in the fields od dance, music and drama etc. Since inception the Sangeet Kala Sangam produced many folk and classical dance productions during the decades. Some important dance may be mentioned as Fungarel, Hiri Konba, Nongpok Wanglen Khongdarol, Loyalakpa Kumdamlon, Chakpa Haraoba Dance( a research product), Basanta Rash(a classical based on Lord Krishna) etc.. Till now this institution has pariticipated many dance / drama competition organised by the Government Organisation and Non Government organisation throughout the country and won prizes. It has been giving many cultural programmes performance throughout the country like in the India International Trade Fair, Pragadi Maidan New Delhi for Manipur State Day organised by the Government of Manipur.Above and all, it gives its dance and drama production as its own and also in the DDK,Guwahati & Imphal periodically as part of its development of art and culture and preservation of cultural Heritage.

detailsOfAchievement: SMILE TRAIN SHIJA CLEFT PROJECT Providing free operation to patients with cleft lip and palate under the sponsorship of Smile Train Inc., USA, through Shija Hospitals and Research Institute Pvt. Ltd., as sister concern of Shija Health Care and Research Institute (SHCRI). The Smile Train Project started on 9th June 2006 and has successfully operated more than 3500 patients free of cost. We have been working on ensuring that the benefit of the project reaches to the masses of the North-Eastern part of India & even to the extent of Myanmar. Mission Myanmar on 23rd 24th &25th of May 2013 and on 20th 21st 22nd of March 2014. Where in 87 & 27 free cleft surgeries were respectively performed successfully. Various initiatives that have been undertaken till date are listed below: - Mission Barak. - Mission Nagaland. - Mission Ukhrul. - Mission Senapati. - Mission Myanmar. - Mission Churachandpur. SHIJA BLOOD BANK & TRANSFUSION SERVICES Shija Blood Bank & Transfusion Services is the only licensed blood bank accredited by the National Accreditation Board for Hospitals & Healthcare Providers (NABH) in North Eastern states. It is equipped with Nucleic Acid Test (NAT) facility to screen HIV, Hepatitis B & C Virus which is the first installation in the entire Eastern India. SHIJA VITAMIN ANGELS PROJECT It is a project to provide free Vitamin A supplements and Albendazole to all children between 6 months and 5 years of age. Implemented effectively from January 2015. It is a collaborative effort of Shija Health Care and Research Institute (SHCRI) and Vitamin Angels, a US based NGO, and a simple cost effective dose of vitamin A every six months can prevent blindness and reduce under-five child mortality by 24% in at risk populations. Vitamin A Deficiency (VAD) is the most common cause of preventable blindness in children under five and reduction of VAD has a vital role in maintaining eye health and vision, growth, and immune function. Free Vitamin A for children between 6 months and 5 years and Albendazole for children between 1 year and 5 years is distributed in various camps and are also available on all days at Shija Hospitals & Research Institute, HealthCity Langol. SHIJA VITAMIN ANGELS PROJECT has distributed 948 bottles of Vitamin A (100,000 IU) (1 bottle =500 doses), 960 bottles of Vitamin A (200,000 IU) (1 bottle =500 doses) and 858 bottles of Albendazole (400 mg) (1 bottle =500 doses) till date. SHIJA EYE CARE FOUNDATION Founded: Year 2007 Shija Eye Care Foundation has operated more than 20000 cataract surgeries till date. We also conduct various Eye Screening camp on the average of 7 to 8 camps per month in rural and remote areas of Manipur to cater the underserved region. The detected patients for surgeries especially the cataracts are provided transportation to and from base hospital, free stay for two nights . Shija Eye Care Foundation-an initiative (Mission for Vision â€“ Myanmar) held from 25/12/ 2013 to 29/12/ 2013where in 179 cataract surgeries were performed free of cost by a team from Shija Eye Care Foundation at Monywa General Hospital, Sagaing region. Shija Eye Care Foundation has been contributing the 60% to 70% of cataract surgeries from the total 30000 operable cases of Manipur. But the overall backlog is increasing by years as we cannot operate more then 3500-4000 per year. Shija Eye Care Foundation also has been certified for cornea transplantation by Directorate of Health Services Manipur on 22nd April 2016.

detailsOfAchievement: The SKY Hospital and Research Centre Private Limited Imphal is the only full-fledged heart hospital in Manipur with both Interventional Cardiology and Open Heart Surgery (CTVS) facilities. Free services rendered by the Hospital are: 1. Provided free OPD and Echocardiography screening of 387 children below 18 years of age. 2. Conducted Free Cathlab procedures for "Non-operative Closure Hole in the Heart" (CHD) in respect of 21 BPL children (ASD Device Closure: 8; PDA Device Closure: 13). 3. Performed subsidised Cathlab procedures (50% subsidy) for 49 heart patients belonging to Economically Weaker Sections (EWS) of society and general public. 4. conducted free heart surgeries in respect of 33 heart patients belonging to BPL families. 5. Official partners of National Health Mission in Manipur state for free treatment of congenital Heart Diseases (CHD) of children under Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakaram (RBSK) program. 6. Assisted by NEC for procurement of advanced medical devices and equipment for providing state of the art facilities for treatment of heart diseases.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: NEC Project on Procurement of Advanced Medical Devices and Equipment (10% State share)

title: SNEHA BHAVAN
detailsOfAchievement: SNEHA BHAVAN IS A NON-GOVERMRNTAL OGANISTION.I t was established in 1994 for the female drug user,alchoholic,widow affected/infected with HIV/AIDS and their children. sneha bhavan organized various programmes and activites for the drug users so that they may adopt positive life style.The activites are vocation training like:weaving,tailoring,flowermaking,basketmaking,pillow designing,purse making,poultry,piggery etc.The organization olso conducted sensitization of different community leaders on women empowering,health hygiene,their legal right and the educational support of the children.The organization is presently focusing on the most affected five districts of the state ie chandal,Imphal west,Imphal east.thoubal,charachumpur.Since 2010 , the orgnisation has not less than 7-10 children passing higher secondary and senior higher secondary every year.The organization is giving treatment to more than 180-190 females drugs addicts and alcoholics every year.The organistion also reached out to more than 1000 families through CHAHA project.The oganisation receives help from VIDES international for the children education.Sneha Bhavan de-addiction and rehabilitation is sponsord by the Ministry of Justice and Empowerment,Government of India from 1998-1999.Those who lose job due to alcoholic where place back to their job.Many Women are living quality life through vocational training , self help group, through treatment.
